result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kyle M Wanta

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Clerk Marisa/Kimberly.
Case Called: 10:24 am 
INCLUDES 14CM1729, 15CM880, AND 15CF569. 
State appears by ADA Sid Brubacher; Def appears in person with Atty Julie Sawyer.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed. 

State moves to:
In 14CM1729: Ct. 2 (OAR)>>D&RI. 
In 15CM800: Ct. 1 (OAR)>>D&RI. 
                     : Ct. 2 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
In 15CF569: Cts. 1 - 3 (Felony BJ)>>D&RI. 
                    : Ct. 4 (OAR)>>D&RI. 
                    : Cts. 5 - 7 (Misd. BJ)>>D&RI. 
COURT grants above. 

PLEA: In 14CM1729: Ct. 1 (OWI 3rd)>>NO CONTEST. 

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  
COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis, & def guilty. 
State makes statement. Atty Sawyer makes statement. Def makes statement. 

COURT ORDERS: SWH for 18 months probation CONDITIONS: $1694 inclusive; SSTOP; 125 days MCJ - 100 days STAYED and 25 days IMPOSED with 45 days to report - with huber for work/school/treatment if def qualifies; absolute sobriety from drugs/alcohol except for prescriptions taken as prescribed and with prior agent authorization; Any vehicle titled or registered in the defendant's name is subject to IID for 27 months, as is the defendant himself; 27 months dl revocation with admin credit; AODA. 
COURT ORDERS half priced IID. 
COURT finds the def is entitled to 1 day jail credit. 

Adj: 10:36 am

ADDRESS INFO for Kyle M Wanta
Current: 1220 Townline Rd Apt 8, Wausau, WI 54403 United States  (Effective: 07-08-2015)
Prior: 144 State Highway 49, Wittenberg, WI 54499
Status conference on July 8, 2015 at 08:15 am.
Shall not drive a motor vehicle without valid driver's license.
